summary: The story is about Commissioner Jordan who arrives in Marseille to combat drug trafficking activities in his own unique way.
cast: Jean-Paul Belmondo|Henry Silva|Carlos Sotto Mayor|Pierre Vernier|Maurice Barrier|Claude Brosset|Tchéky Karyo|Jacques Maury|Roger Dumas|Gabriel Cattand|Michel Robin|Jacques David|Jean-Louis Richard|Didier Sauvegrain|Stéphane Ferrara|Daniel Breton|Jean-Roger Milo|Dany Kogan|Henri Attal|Jean-Claude Dreyfus|Joseph Pertic|Maurice Auzel|Pierre Belot|Mehmet Ulusoy|Jacques Van Dooren|Michel Berreur|Jean-Louis Airola|Corinne Brodbeck|Yves Gabrielli|Marc Chpill|Christian Bor|Jean-Hugues Lime|Gérard Moisan|Philippe Héliès|Serge Uzan|Jacky Venon|Fatiha Gagelin|Laetitia Gabrielli|Sidney Kotto|Ysabelle Lacamp|Frederique Lafond-Molinari|Aurora Maris|Lin Tyson|Mohamed Adi|Jean Toscan|Daniel Perche|Patrick Paillol|René Chateau|Daniel Dudon|Jean Herman|Charly Koubesserian|Paul Sørensen
title: El marginal
